question: 叫ぶ
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>shout</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to shout</vocabulary>. Can also be <vocabulary>to scream</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: To remember the reading of this, just think about how you start <vocabulary>to shout</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>to scream</vocabulary> when you drink way too much <reading>sake</reading> (<ja>さけ</ja>).
